Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine light-brown. Circular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie noted several such stamps in his 1884-5 diary (EES Archive XVII 47). Name Ion. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0369.21.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0420)
